### Project Leader for DFO Pacific Region

#### Solicitation Number: 30003366

The Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) Canada is soliciting proposals for the services of a senior Project Leader/Executive and an intermediate Project Administrator to support the Pacific Salmon Strategy Initiative (PSSP) in the Pacific Region.

#### Project Description
The DFO is seeking professional services to provide program and project management support through the pre-implementation and implementation stages of the PSSP. The successful proponent will be responsible for leading the project team and ensuring the delivery of the project within the specified timeframe.

#### Key Deliverables

* Provide program and project management support to DFO regional executives and staff
* Deliver the project within the timeframe of contract award to August 31, 2024

#### Requirements for Participation
This requirement is open only to suppliers who are registered under the Trade Agreement Holder (TAH) program and have an active standing offer (SO) under Solicitation Number E60ZT-18TSPS. Suppliers must be qualified for the following categories:

* 3.3 Project Leader/Executive (one senior-level resource)
* 3.1 Project Administrator (one intermediate-level resource)

To be eligible, suppliers must request an invitation from the DFO Procurement Officer on the file. Proof of being added to the TAH profile must be provided to the DFO Procurement Officer before the invitation request is considered.

#### Notice of Proposal
A Notice of Proposal has been published on the Government of Canada's Buy and Sell (MERX) portal. The proposal deadline is January 23, 2023, at 14:00.

#### Important Dates

* Tender Closing Date: January 23, 2023, 14:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: Post-Award
* Expected Contract End Date: August 31, 2024

#### Contact Information

For more information, please contact:

Richard Soulliere
DFO Tenders
DFO.Tenders-Soumissions.MPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca
